description:
Spacious and versatile, the Pace 20 Hydration Pack provides storage options for fast-paced adventures on foot or bike. The harness adapts to your body movement for a snug and chafe-free wear. A hydration sleeve and lots of pockets provide access to fuel throughout the day.

  • Durable recycled nylon ripstop pack body
  • Soft edge binding prevents chafing
  • Large main compartment, zippered front pocket, side pocket and stash shoulder pockets for gels
  • Vertically adjustable sternum strap
  • Side compression bungee with cord lock for stashing extra layers
  • Hydration sleeve with hook and loop hanger includes a 1.5L reservoir, with leakproof foldlock closure
  • Recco® reflector is detectable by ski patrols and search and rescue teams
name: MEC Pace 20 Hydration Pack - Unisex
